cde 0.1.0
  • Reference

Search database of site names

Source: R/search_names.r
search_names.Rd

Searches the listing of EA monitoring sites to find rows that contain the string provided. Can search by name (name), Management Catchment (MC), Operational Catchment (OC) or River Basin District (RBD). The search is done on a local copy of the waterbody listing rather than connecting to the EA site.

search_names(string = NULL, column = NULL)

Arguments

string

The search string to be matched. Will match whole or partial strings in the column values.
column

The column to be searched. Possible options are name, OC (Operational Catchment), MC (Management Catchment) and RBD (River Basin District)

Value

A data frame containing the details of all the sites that match the search string (full or partial matches) in the column specified.

Examples

# search for Management Catchments containing "Kennet"
search_names("Kennet", "MC")
#>                WBID                                                       name
#> 2589 GB106039017360                           Inkpen Stream (source to Kennet)
#> 2590 GB106039017300                 West End Brook (tributary of Foudry Brook)
#> 2591 GB106039017380                        Foudry Brook (West End Brook to M4)
#> 2592 GB106039023120                                             Clayhill Brook
#> 2593 GB106039023173                  Middle Kennet (Marlborough to Hungerford)
#> 2594 GB106039017410                                           Burghfield Brook
#> 2595 GB106039017370               Shalbourne  (source to Kennet at Hungerford)
#> 2596 GB106039017280                         Enborne (Source to downstream A34)
#> 2597 GB106039017310               Enborne (downstream A34 to Burghclere Brook)
#> 2598     GB30642611                         Farnham Flint or Englefield Lagoon
#> 2599 GB106039017210                                             Penwood Stream
#> 2600 GB106039017250                      Ecchinswell Brook (source to Enborne)
#> 2601     GB30642622                                 Ameys Lake or Theale Lakes

# search for River Basin Districts containing "Tweed"

# NOT RUN {
search_names("Tweed", "RBD")
# }
